overview: This is the story of Kike and Alfredo Sotelo, two brothers from the coast somewhere in Latin America, who hold the Guinness record for repeating 11th grade more than 16 consecutive times. But everything takes another course the day the father of the brothers dies of a sudden heart attack when he learns once again that his children lost the year again. When reading the will, the father makes it clear that the only way to access the median inheritance is by graduating from college.
title: De regreso al colegio
